name: 2D Shooter (pablomarcel)
description:
Credits:

Created by Brian Winn

Modified by Pablo Montijo

Level 2. Created a new layout. Assembled 11 enemies. Rescaled assets, and rotated enemies for a more logical playing experience

Level 3. Created a new "scroller" layout, added a new background. Assembled 13 enemies. 

Resized the spaceship and changed the speed for a more enjoyable experience. 

Updated the next level button for levels 2 and 3

Added art assets in all levels
